sentences.english: I hope that these 17 tips will help you find a way out of grumpiness.
sentences.chinese: 我希望這17個辦法可以幫助你脫離暴躁的情緒。

sentences.english: It~s bitter, sour and peppery, but also sweet.
sentences.chinese: 這是苦的，酸和暴躁，而且甜。

sentences.english: My brother is ill-tempered, and always stirs up trouble.
sentences.chinese: 我弟弟的脾氣很暴躁，常惹是生非。

sentences.english: Dad, I since the childhood to you are filled with hate, I hate you the flip-side of bad temper.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸我從小對你充滿怨恨，我討厭你那暴躁的壞脾氣。

sentences.english: Grandpa is really cranky if he doesn’t have his afternoon nap.
sentences.chinese: 祖父如果不睡午覺就會很暴躁。

sentences.english: My brother is ill-tempered , and likes to stir up trouble outside.
sentences.chinese: 我弟弟的脾氣很暴躁，常喜歡在外面惹是生非。

sentences.english: There are some who are impatient, has a bad temper and just want to finish the war fast.
sentences.chinese: 有些將領性格暴躁，沒有忍耐性，只是一心追求速戰。

sentences.english: It can affect your sleep and make youfeel groggy and grumpy.
sentences.chinese: 這會影響睡眠以及讓人覺得昏沉和暴躁。

sentences.english: Choleric people don't cry easily or show much emotion at all.
sentences.chinese: 暴躁的人不會輕易哭泣，或顯露過多的情緒。

sentences.english: Sometimes grumpiness can be a sign of health problems.
sentences.chinese: 有時候，情緒暴躁是健康出問題的一個信號。
我有一個脾氣暴躁的弟弟。

sentences.english: but people are shorter-tempered, but just seem more irritable
sentences.chinese: 但是人們脾氣更暴躁，更容易發怒。

sentences.english: Sara has decided to burn bridges with her hot-tempered boyfriend.
sentences.chinese: 莎拉決定和脾氣暴躁的男朋友斷絕聯繫。

sentences.english: In particular, chronic pain can lead to grumpiness.
sentences.chinese: 特別是慢性的病痛會導致情緒暴躁。

sentences.english: He felt disdain for worldly pleasures and was totally guileless , like a child. But he had a violent temper.
sentences.chinese: 他輕蔑世間的歡樂，像孩子一樣地坦率，但脾氣暴躁。

definition: to fly into a rage/to rage violently
to catch fire/to ignite/to detonate/to get angry
